column1: Hive is a full stack deep learning platform helping to bring companies into the AI era.
Two Stanford graduate students determined to build practical applications using novel deep learning technologies founded Hive (https://thehive.ai/). From the beginning
column2: we knew that high-quality datasets were critical to creating deep learning models. However
column3: we also knew that the quantity of labeled data also has a huge impact on model performance. With this in mind
column4: we first started by building a data- labelling platform specifically designed to solve machine-learning problems. This platform
column6: is now the world’s largest distributed human workforce for data labelling and produces millions of high-quality annotations every day. Hive Data allows us to label uncommonly large datasets at a fraction of the cost that other data labelling solutions would charge. Once Hive Data was built
column7: we were able to quickly label enormous datasets and rapidly build a suite of machine learning models that now form our core offerings in Hive Predict.

column1: Our Hive Predict team has since built a wide range of custom machine learning models spanning a range of verticals including media
column4: and autonomous driving. Drawing on this experience and expertise
column5: we then set out to build a stand-alone analytics platform for TV advertising called Hive Media. Hive Media synthesises our company's fundamental technologies and leverages industry partnerships to deliver a truly revolutionary product. Hive offers the only true
column6: full- stack deep learning platform in the world
